name: Guide to Ingenuity
description: Talent Level-Up material.  Ingenuity is the leaf-veins of the nation of wisdom. Ingenuity sets words ofintegrity on the right path. One who thinks out of goodwill and in a cleverand careful fashion never deviates from the path of boons. Yet one who thinkswith contempt and malice shall taint their words with despicable colors.
